web_snippets: Juan Carlos Coto is an executive producer and director of the ABC series “9-1-1” and was the showrunner/executive producer of “From Dusk till Dawn: The Series.”
Juan Carlos Coto. Producer: The Pretender. Juan Carlos Coto is known for The Pretender (1996), 9-1-1 (2018) and Nikita (2010).
